SELECT U.vendorCode, V.VENDOR_NM AS vendorName, U.userId, U.userName, U.phone, U.email, U.status, U.createdAt, U.blockFlag, U.delFlag FROM (
SELECT VENDOR_CD AS vendorCode, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NM AS userName, TEL_NO AS phone, EMAIL AS email, PROGRESS_CD AS status, REG_DATE AS createdAt, NULL AS blockFlag, DEL_FLAG AS delFlag FROM VNCH_US
UNION ALL
SELECT VENDOR_CD AS vendorCode, USER_ID AS userId, USER_NM AS userName, TEL_NUM AS phone, EMAIL AS email, PROGRESS_CD AS status, REG_DATE AS createdAt, BLOCK_FLAG AS blockFlag, DEL_FLAG AS delFlag FROM VN_USER ) U LEFT JOIN VNCH V ON U.vendorCode = V.VENDOR_CD
U.delFlag = 'N'
AND V.VENDOR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{vendorName}, '%')
AND U.userId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
AND U.userName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND U.blockFlag = #{blockFlag}
AND U.createdAt >= #{startDate}
AND U.createdAt <= #{endDate}
AND U.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
ORDER BY U.createdAt DESC
